text:
Good afternoon,
Next year I will go to Paris because I have to make an intership during the summer. I will go in Paris during three months. I write this e-mail because I need money during this intership. A friend tell me that there are ERASMUS scholarship and I want some information about this. I will go in a appartement with one of my friend and we have to pay 700€ per Month. We also have to pay some food and we need help for this. If ERASMUS scholarship is not possible, can you tell me an other help that we could have ? I will be very cool.
Last year, two ESIR students went to Paris and they had a ERASMUS scholarship. They told me that it's very usefull when we are abroad because Paris is a riche country and all is very expensive.
I will explain you my travel during this three months to show you that I'm very serious. Fistly, I will make Paris - Paris with airplane. I will pass 2 days in Paris beacause it's a very beautifull city, and after this two days, I will go to Paris by the bus. It's very fast and not expensive ! After this I will visite Paris during the week-end. The Monday, I will start my intership in Paris university. In Paris, I will search a job, maybe in a cafe or in a restaurant because I need money. A good point with Paris is that they speak French. But they have a terrible accent ! The intership finish the last week of september. I don't know when I will go to Paris but my University year start half October in ESIR.
I think it's very important to travel across the world. We can discover new culture, activities and landscape for example. Also, we could improve our English language.
To conclude this e-mail, I have to tell you that I'm very serious and I really want this ERASMUS scholarship. If you have a question, tell me and I will answer very fast.
Thank you very much,
Alex Dupont
